aworthen@... writes:

> O.K. I know we just finished up a whole thread on tatoos, but I really
think
> I might get one tonight! I'm a nervous wreck about the pain and I'm looking
> for comments from those of you that have had them.
> Thanks,
> Amy

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Fw: tatoos
messages.msgSnippet: Amy, It s not that bad!  I have two tattoos; a butterfly on one arm above the wrist and Mickey Mouse on the other.  It doesn t hurt like a shot.  It s more of
messages.messageBody:
Amy,
It's not that bad! I have two tattoos; a butterfly on one arm above the
wrist and Mickey Mouse on the other. It doesn't hurt like a shot. It's more
of a stinging and burning, but I thought it was mild. Of course, if you opt
for doing it on a more tender part of your body, it might hurt more. The
worst part for me was the healing process. I have ***never*** experienced
such itching! All you want to do it sit down and have a good scratch, but
you can't. But I say go for it!

Carol
